bibl.title: The Meropis (SH 903 A).
bibl.note: P. Coll. Youtie I, 1 = P. Köln III, 126. "I think it highly probable that the author of the Meropis belongs to the archaic period, most likely the second half of the sixth century, as the first editors suggested."

bibl.title: Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. I

bibl.seg: Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. I (Napoli, 1984) pp. 141-150.

P. Coll. Youtie I, 1 = P. Köln III, 126. "I think it highly probable that the author of the Meropis belongs to the archaic period, most likely the second half of the sixth century, as the first editors suggested."
